webpage.para: This list shows the things that needs to be done:

listitem.para: More documentation: many methods have not yet been described (See Javadoc Stats). Better documentation: each class can have example code on how to use that class.
Write a non-accelerated 3D viewer, like the one in Jmol. Some work has been done, but it is not completed.
For now, Jmol can be used. See cdk-view's --useJmol option.
More JUnit tests: not all methods of the core classes are tested.
A IUPAC name generator is being developed.
Substructure is developed and is awaiting inclusion in CVS.

webpage.para: This lists shows the things we would like to have/do:

listitem.para: A energy minimizer / moleculare dynamics module
An interface API to other programs and implementation (like Tinker, Gaussian, Mopac etc)
A cdk-merge program that adds information of a second file to the information from the first one.
Improved CML reader that is able to read XHTML documents with CML fragments.
Command line tools (cdk-dbquery/cdk-dbinsert) to add structures to and retrieve structures from the database.
Code that can generate 3D structures, based on common angles and distances between bonds. Babel is able to do this, so only the code has to be ported.

webpage.para: Other wishes can be found and posted at this SF webpage.
